composer.body_none: This request has no body content
composer.generic_builder_error: Request build failed, please check URL format

curl_modal.error_format: Could not parse command, please ensure it is standard curl format

empty.title: No Rules or Groups
empty.desc: Use 'New Rule' in the title bar or the button below to create a group.

conflict.shadowed_desc: The terminal rule "{{name}}" above captures this traffic, so this rule will not execute. Try moving it up.

alerts.discard_msg: You have unsaved changes. Switching rules will lose these changes. Continue?
alerts.discard_close_msg: Unsaved changes detected. Are you sure you want to discard and close?
alerts.delete_msg: Are you sure you want to delete this rule? This action cannot be undone.
alerts.load_error_msg: Some rule files on disk could not be parsed and were skipped. Please fix them manually.

validation.invalid_type: Invalid or missing 'type'. Must be one of: {{types}}
validation.min_actions: Rule must have at least one action

rules.export_description: Export as ZIP file, preserving directory structure

scripts.title: Python Scripting
scripts.subtitle: Powered by mitmproxy. Use Python scripts for advanced control and workflow automation.

empty.title: No Scripts
empty.desc: Create a Python script to intercept and modify traffic.

scripts.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete script "{{name}}"? This will permanently delete the file from disk.
scripts.select_desc: Select a script from the list to edit, or create a new one.
scripts.restart_hint: Changes require proxy restart to take effect

status.trusted: This computer trusts the root certificate.
status.untrusted: System does not trust this certificate. HTTPS cannot be decrypted.

state.trusted_desc: RelayCraft Root CA is trusted by your system. No further action is required.
state.untrusted_desc: Install the root certificate to intercept and analyze HTTPS traffic securely.

storage.title: Certificate Storage
storage.desc: Root certificate is stored in your home directory. You can export it to other devices.

auto.title: Smart Auto Install
auto.desc: Click the "Install & Trust Certificate" button on the left. RelayCraft will attempt to configure local trust store automatically.
auto.desktop_desc: Supports automatic injection for Windows (CertUtil) and macOS (Keychain).
auto.mobile_desc: Mobile devices require manual configuration using the guide on the right.
auto.admin_hint: Auto install requires administrator privileges to modify system trust store

guides.title: Installation Guides
windows: Click Open Storage Directory on the left
Double click mitmproxy-ca-cert.pem
In Import Wizard, select [Current User] → [Next], leave password empty
Select [Place all certificates in the following store]
Click [Browse] and select [Trusted Root Certification Authorities] → [OK]
Finish import and click [Yes] in security warning

macos_sequoia_hint.title: macOS 15 (Sequoia) Automation Limit
macos_sequoia_hint.desc: Due to system restrictions, auto-install may fail on Sequoia. We recommend using the Terminal Command below.

macos: Click Install & Trust Certificate on the left to open certificate preview
In Keychain Access, double click RelayCraft certificate
Expand [Trust] dropdown, set [When using this certificate] to [Always Trust]
Close window and enter system password
guides.terminal_desc: Paste into terminal, enter password and press Enter.

mobile.step1_desc: Ensure mobile device is on the same LAN and proxy is configured.
mobile.manual_transfer_tip: Tip: If connection fails, send the certificate file from computer to phone directly (most reliable).
mobile.android_hint: Note: Modern Android systems have strict built-in security policies; Root access or specialized debugging configurations may be required for traffic decryption.

troubleshooting.title: Still can't capture?
troubleshooting.ios_trust: iOS MUST enable full trust in [About] → [Certificate Trust Settings].
troubleshooting.app_pinning: Some apps (banking, enterprise) use SSL Pinning and cannot be easily decrypted.

ios: Scroll to bottom and click [Certificate Trust Settings] (Crucial)
android: Select the downloaded file and confirm installation

plugins.title: Plugins

empty.title: No Plugins Found
empty.desc: Place plugins in the 'plugins' folder in data directory

market.empty_tip: No matching plugins or themes found

plugins.market_desc: Discover and install community plugins to extend RelayCraft capabilities.
plugins.market_desc_theme: Discover and install community themes to customize RelayCraft appearance.
plugins.confirm_uninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall this plugin?

guide.title: Plugin Management
guide.desc: Plugins extend core functionality. After enabling plugins with Python logic, please restart proxy in the title bar.

notifications.install_success_msg: Plugin "{{id}}" has been successfully installed and enabled.

errors.help_text: Please check your network connection or try again later.
errors.invalid_format_msg:
plugin.json format is incorrect or contains syntax errors. Please check the plugin package integrity.

Details: {{error}}
errors.invalid_pkg_msg:
plugin.json contains trailing characters or format errors. This may not be a valid RelayCraft plugin package.

Tip: Ensure you selected a .rcplugin or .zip file containing a valid plugin.json.
errors.file_not_found_msg: Could not find or access the selected file. Please verify the file path.
errors.permission_denied_msg: Cannot access the file. Please check file permissions.
errors.already_exists_msg: This plugin is already installed. To reinstall, please uninstall the existing version first.

general.title: General
general.auto_check_update_desc: Automatically check for app and plugin updates on startup
general.confirm_exit_desc: Show a confirmation dialog when closing the app to prevent accidental disruption
general.auto_start_proxy_desc: Automatically start system proxy and capture service on launch.
general.max_traffic_desc: Max requests to keep. Set to 0 for unlimited (watch memory usage).

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.theme_desc: Select or browse new visual themes
appearance.discover_themes_desc: Browse our growing collection of themes to personalize your experience.
appearance.density_desc: Adjust spacing for traffic list and sidebars
appearance.exit_confirm_message:
Are you sure you want to exit RelayCraft?
The proxy service will be stopped.

network.title: Network & Proxy
network.ssl_insecure_desc: For intranet or self-signed certificate environments
network.upstream_desc: In some networks, RelayCraft needs an upstream proxy to reach the internet (e.g., for Plugin Market or AI services).
network.upstream_bypass_desc: Domains in this list will not use the upstream proxy. Separate with commas. Supports suffix matching (e.g., .xxx.com).
network.restart_hint: Note: Proxy restart required after changing Port, SSL, or Upstream Proxy settings

about.title: Support & About
about.error_fetch: Failed to fetch version info. Please check your network.
about.verbose_desc: Log detailed core traffic for diagnostics
about.github_desc: Browse source code and join the community

traffic.empty_desc: Configure your device proxy to start capturing requests.
traffic.start_hint: Click the "Start" button or use shortcut to begin capturing.

setup.system_desc: Route your computer's HTTP/HTTPS traffic through RelayCraft.
setup.mobile_desc: Set the manual proxy on your phone to decrypt your apps.

security.untrusted_desc: HTTPS decryption will not work until you install the root certificate.

map_local.fallback_hint: Automatically fell back to remote response

ai.title: Smart Rule Assistant
ai.yaml_hint: Supports YAML format, more concise and readable
ai.parse_error_hint: Failed to parse generated rule. Switched to YAML mode for manual adjustment.
ai.placeholder: Enter instructions, e.g., block all requests to target domain

rule_editor.convert_script_confirm_enable_script: The new script will be enabled.
rule_editor.convert_script_confirm_restart: Note: Enabling script requires proxy restart.
rule_editor.convert_success_restart_msg: Script has been created and enabled. Restart proxy to apply changes?

rewrite_body.label: Rewrite Body
rewrite_body.desc: Modify request or response body content

mock.label: Modify Response
mock.desc: Intercept and modify response body, supporting full replacement or field injection

rewrite.label: Rewrite Header
rewrite.desc: Add, modify or delete request/response headers

throttle.label: Network Throttling
throttle.desc: Simulate network delay, packet loss and bandwidth limit

hints.terminal: Terminal Action: Successfully matched, stops all subsequent request and response rules.
hints.request_terminal: Terminal Action: Intercepts and returns a response. All subsequent request and response rules will be skipped.
hints.modify: Non-terminal Action: Executes modifications and continues matching subsequent rules.

headers.label: Header Matching (Optional)
headers.tooltip: Match only when request contains specific headers

ops.disabled_hint: Please configure AI API Key in Settings to unlock smart generation.
ops.json_hint: Hint: JSON changes sync to form in real-time.

map_remote.preserve_path_desc: Append original path to target URL

import_modal.title: Import Rules
import_modal.desc: Support single rule JSON or full backup Bundle

ai.title: AI Assistant Config
ai.enable_desc: Enable AI-powered script generation and rule creation
ai.memory_turns_desc: Number of recent turns AI will remember (Sliding window)

setup_guide.title: Proxy Setup Guide
setup_guide.switchy_omega_desc: Install SwitchyOmega extension, create HTTP proxy with Host {{ip}} and Port {{port}}.
setup_guide.system_proxy_desc: Search 'Proxy' in system settings, enable 'Use a proxy server', and enter the address/port above.
setup_guide.wifi_manual_desc: Ensure mobile is on same Wi-Fi. Go to settings → Wi-Fi details → Proxy → Manual.
setup_guide.install_cert_desc: After setting proxy, visit http://mitm.it on mobile browser to install certificate for HTTPS.
setup_guide.trouble_desc: Check firewall settings and ensure port {{port}} is available.

script_editor.intro_desc: Scripts allow deep interception and modification of traffic flowing through RelayCraft, using Python.
